Mujina.evaluation: Mujina is a flagship-oriented BB with meh stats and good skills. Her personal damage is good due to multiple barrages upon Main Gun Fire, but the damage is unremarkable compared to good SR BBs currently available. Overall, she is a good ship.

Namiko.evaluation: Namiko is a damage-oriented CA with meh stats and skills. Using her to actiate Rikka's skill requirement is not recommended. Collection only.

event.name: The Alchemist and the Archipelago of Secrets (Atelier Ryza)

Reisalin Stout.evaluation: Ryza is a damage-oriented mobbing CL with amazing clearing potential within the first 30s of a battle. Her stats are very solid, and coupled with MGM+1 give her good damage output from her Main Guns. Her skills immensely buff the damage potential of all her Auxiliary barrages, and her unique Augment Module adds more barrages to the mix. You want all the Atelier Ryza Bombs equipped on Ryza, due to the +20% crit rate buff to by barrages when equipped by her for applying "Item Mark" to enemies, and for the "Fatal Drive" unique Augment Module barrage. After all her barrages are exhausted, she is painfully average. Amazing CL for mobbing.

event.name: The Alchemist and the Archipelago of Secrets (Atelier Ryza)

Klaudia Valentz.evaluation: Klaudia is a support-oriented CVL with interesting skills. The stats are average for a good CV, so no issues there. Her skills make her act like a healer, especially for Ryza ships. Her skill and augment barrages add to her damage, but compared to other 8-plane damage-oriented CVs, her damage is lacking due to only having 7-planes. Due to her heal being spread out, and having a pseudo preload (from the barrage activation at the start of the battle), and having better per-strike damage, she is an amazing support. Unicorn Retrofit is better than her regardless. Amazing Healer CVL.

event.name: The Alchemist and the Archipelago of Secrets (Atelier Ryza)

Patricia Abelheim.evaluation: Patricia is a flagship-oriented damage-dealer BB with great stats and amazing skills. Her stats are very standard for a good BB, and are buffed further through her skills. She has a very wide pattern, decent damage, guarenteed barrage every main gun shot, which is amazing for clearing potential. Great BB overall.

event.name: The Alchemist and the Archipelago of Secrets (Atelier Ryza)

Kala Ideas.evaluation: Kala is a tank-oriented CB with amazing bulk and decent damage. Her stats and skills make her very tanky, and her damage output is alright with MGM+1 CB guns and some barrages. The RNG element from her Augment Skill to save her from death is a nice bonus. Top non-rainbow tank option.

event.name: The Alchemist and the Archipelago of Secrets (Atelier Ryza)

Lila Decyrus.evaluation: Lila is a damage-oriented CA with decent bulk but high damage potential. Her stats, skills, and Augment give her decent bulk. With enough stacks of her skills, her damage can really ramp up over time. She is ideally sortied with other Ryza ships to give her maximum damage potential. Overall, she is a good ship.

event.name: The Alchemist and the Archipelago of Secrets (Atelier Ryza)

Serri Glaus.evaluation: Serri is a damage-oriented CV with average stats and average skills. As a solo-CV, her damage is decent, with an 8-plane loadout, barrage on Airstrike, and the damage dealt buffs she gains throughout the battle from skills and Augments. In an Atelier fleet, her 2nd skill can activate way more frequently, and her 3rd skill can grant more AP overall to the fleet, thus increasing her contribution by a fair bit. Inside Atelier fleet: Great CV option. Outside Atelier fleet: Meh CV option.

event.name: The Ninja Scrolls: Azur Flash (Senran Kagura)

Asuka.evaluation: Asuka is a damage-oriented CL with great stats and skills. Her personal damage is high due to MGM+1, multiple barrages, and great self-buffs. To gain the most value of her self-buffs, she needs to be sortied in a Senran Kagura fleet. Even outside of a Senran Kagura fleet, she is still good. Her bulk is also fine due to her stats combined with the life-steal from her Skill 2. Overall, she is a great ship.

event.name: The Ninja Scrolls: Azur Flash (Senran Kagura)

Yumi.evaluation: Yumi is a damage-oriented CV with great stats and skills. She has a full 8-plane CV loadout along with great plane efficiencies and self-buffs, making her damage good. Her barrage is also good. Her slow support is nice when it happens, but not relevant for her to be good. Overall, she is a great ship.

event.name: The Ninja Scrolls: Azur Flash (Senran Kagura)

Fubuki (Senran Kagura).evaluation: Fubuki is an off-flag damage-oriented BB with great stats and skills. Her Skill 1 has a nice debuff to enemies, in addition to buffing her initial Main Gun shot. Her Skill 2 is also a good debuff as well. Her barrage is mostly aimed, and has a 100% chance to proc with her augment. Overall, she is a great ship.

event.name: The Ninja Scrolls: Azur Flash (Senran Kagura)

Ikaruga.evaluation: Ikaruga is a tank-oriented CA with great stats and skills. Her personal damage is great due to MGM+1, and good barrages. Her bulk is also good due to her stat spread, as well as her self-buffs and Skill 1 barrier. Overall, she is a great ship.

event.name: The Ninja Scrolls: Azur Flash (Senran Kagura)

Homura.evaluation: Homura is a damage-oriented SS with great stats and skills. Her personal damage is very high for an SS due to her stats, efficiencies, and multiple barrages. Her survivability can be an issue due to her Augment-buffed Skill 1, but the damage gains from it are too good to pass up. Overall, she is a great ship.

event.name: The Ninja Scrolls: Azur Flash (Senran Kagura)

Yūyaki.evaluation: Yūyaki is a damage-oriented CA with good stats and skills. Her personal damage is good due to MGM+1, good self-buffs, and her Skill 2's second main gun shot. Her barrage is good, but the range is very short so its hard to hit. Overall, she is a good ship, but can be a sidegrade to more easily accessible options.

event.name: The Ninja Scrolls: Azur Flash (Senran Kagura)

Murasaki.evaluation: Murasaki is a damage-oriented CVL with good stats and skills. She only has 6 planes, but her barrages are good, making her personal damage good. In addition, she has a fast-load, and inflicts DoT on enemies hit by her barrage, further adding to her utility. Overall, she is a good ship, but can be a sidegrade to more easily accessible options.

Amagi(CV).preload: 50% 1st Airstrike Cooldown Reduction (with Akagi or Kaga).
